markdown-hako.markdown-it-attrs.enable: Enables the feature to add custom attributes to elements. Removes custom IDs in {#id} format from the preview screen and applies them when converting to HTML.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-attrs.options: Configure detailed settings for the markdown-it-attrs plugin.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-table-of-conte: Automatically detects headings in the document and generates a hierarchical table of contents. Facilitates navigation.
Configure detailed settings for the markdown-it-table-of-contents plugin.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-footnote.optio: Configure detailed settings for the markdown-it-footnote plugin.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-sup.enable: Enables superscript notation. Easily represent superscript characters used in mathematical formulas and chemical equations.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-sup.options: Configure detailed settings for the markdown-it-sup plugin.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-sub.enable: Enables subscript notation. Easily represent subscript characters used in chemical formulas and mathematical notations.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-sub.options: Configure detailed settings for the markdown-it-sub plugin.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-kbd.enable: Generates <kbd> tags to represent keyboard key inputs. Useful for explaining shortcut keys and other keyboard operations.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-kbd.options: Configure detailed settings for the markdown-it-kbd plugin.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-underline.enab: Enables the feature to underline text. Visually emphasize important parts or sections you want to highlight.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-underline.opti: Configure detailed settings for the markdown-it-underline plugin.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-mark.enable: Enables the feature to highlight contextually important sections. Uses the <mark> tag to change the background color and emphasize text.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-mark.options: Configure detailed settings for the markdown-it-mark plugin.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-mojicolor.enab: Enables the feature to change text color. Visually emphasize specific words or sentences by coloring them.
markdown-hako.markdown-it-mojicolor.opti: Configure detailed settings for the markdown-it-mojicolor plugin.
